settings.title: Shipping
settings.text: At Beige we offer free delivery nationwide. Once you place your order, an email will be sent to you and our customer care representative will call you to confirm the order. For cash on delivery please pay the rider before opening the package. Order for Lahore, Karachi & Islamabad will be delivered in 2-4 business days while delivery to other cities may take up to 10 business days.

settings.title: Returns
settings.text:
At Beige, we don’t offer returns/ refund however sizes can be exchanged within 7 days from date of delivery. Kindly note that the products must be unused with all tags intact. Please note that products on sale cannot be exchanged. Contact us on email or number within 3 days of delivery for any queries related to exchange of products. Kindly note that the customer will bear the shipping cost while exchanging the product.

 

You can also cancel your order any time before the order is processed. Once the order is shipped, you will receive a confirmation email containing a unique tracking number and our return and exchange policy will be applicable. We reserve the right to cancel orders in case the item is out of stock or card payment is declined by the issuing financial institution.

settings.title: Does beige have a physical store?
settings.text: No, we are an online store at the moment.

settings.title: What is the delivery time?
settings.text: We deliver confirm orders across Pakistan within 3-5 business days.

settings.title: Do you have a return/exchange policy?
settings.text: At Beige, we do not accept returns. However, you can exchange products within 7 days of purchase with the sales receipt, if the product is defective or of an incorrect size. Products must be tagged and in perfect condition. Sale articles are non-exchangeable. Please refer to the exchange policy for more details.

settings.title: Do you have a refund policy?
settings.text: We do not offer refunds. However, we do offer exchange. You can refer to the exchange policy for further details.

settings.title: How do I choose my correct size?
settings.text: For every product there is an individual size chart attached for your assistance.

settings.title: What are the payment methods for Beige?
settings.text: We offer online card transactions and cash-on-delivery payment options for our customers.

settings.title: Do you offer discounts for your products?
settings.text: Keep an eye on our social media platforms for any discounts and promotions.

settings.title: Does Beige have customer support?
settings.text: Yes, we have a customer care team that can be contacted via call, chat or email from 9AM to 6PM, Monday to Saturday.

settings.title: Is Beige accessible via social media?
settings.text: Yes, we are available on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Pinterest and Snap Chat.

settings.title: Do I need to set up an account to make a purchase online?
settings.text: You can make an account or check out as guest for your online purchases.

settings.title: How do I track my order?
settings.text: A unique tracking number is provided to the customer upon placing the order. That tracking number can be used to check your order progress on the third party delivery service’s website.
